sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"普通的，普遍的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: common, ordinary, commonplace, general, usual, popular, universal
means: common ： 多用于指物，侧重很常见，不稀奇。
ordinary ： 用于物，指每天发生，十分平淡无奇；用于人，指无特别之处，很一般。
general ： 语气强于common，侧重大多如此，很少有例外情况。
usual ： 指常见常闻和常做的事或举动，强调惯常性。
popular ： 指适应大众爱好、需要，为大家所公认或接受。
universal与general同义，但语气较强，侧重对每个人或事物都适用，根本没有例外。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"共同的，相互的"之意。
means: mutual ： 着重彼此共有或共享，局限于双方的关系。
common ： 侧重两人或多人共有共同，但不暗示彼此间存在的等价关系。
joint ： 强调至少两人或两方共同占用，侧重指一个统一体。
reciprocal ： 着重互惠，有来有往。

stems_affixes.type_exp: = 表示"服务,职责,社区,公共"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普通的,寻常的;共有的,公共的
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+mon=mun公共→共有的,公共的
com共同+mun社区+e→共同的社区→公社,引申为交流
im不+mun公共+ity表名词→不公共→不和别人一样[得病]→免疫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 交换思想,意见或感受,交流
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+mun社区+e→共同的社区→公社,引申为交流
im不+mun公共+ize表动词→使不公共→使不和别人一样[得病]→使免疫

means.word_mean: 普遍的, 常见的

sentences.en: It's a common word.
sentences.cn: 这是一个常见的字。

sentences.en: This sort of weather is quite common.
sentences.cn: 这种天气很常见。

means.word_mean: 公有的, 共有的, 共同的

sentences.en: Britain and America share a common language.
sentences.cn: 英国和美国共用一种语言。

sentences.en: Certain desires are common to all men.
sentences.cn: 某些欲望对所有的人是共有的。

means.word_mean: 一般的, 平常的

sentences.en: It is common knowledge that the earth is round.
sentences.cn: 地球是圆的是常识。

means.word_mean: 普通的；寻常的；平凡的
粗俗的；庸俗的
众所周知的，臭名昭著的，声名狼藉的
劣等的，低级的；下贱的
通俗的；粗劣的；粗野的
【解剖学】(几个部分)合成的，分出分枝的
【语法学】(名词)普通的；通(性)的；通格的
【数学】公共的；共通的；通约的
【韵律学】(诗歌音节)长短共通的
公共用地；公地
（学校、大学等的）学生公共食堂
【法律】(对土地、水域的)共有权，共用权
【宗教】(基督教某个特定节日所用的)普通礼拜；(天主教弥撒曲中的)固定经文曲；(不同节日、场合用的)普通经文曲</seg>

data.mean: have sth in common (with sth) 有相同的特征（或特点等）

sentence.cn: 然而，我们对新事物的迷恋，以及我们对已经变得普遍的事物的低估，可能而且已经把我们引向了各种错误的方向。
sentence.en: However,  our fascination with the latest,  and our under valuation of what has already become common,  can,  and has,  led us in all sorts of wrong directions.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

sentence.cn: 那么，你如何通过闲聊培养新的友谊或开展工作呢？首先，找到共同点。
sentence.en: So, how can you make small talk lead to a new friendship or job? first off, find common ground.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 任务型读写 原文

lj.lj_ly: it is time our elected officials stood up for the common good.
lj.lj_ls: 该是我们选出的公务员们维护公益的时候了。

jx.jx_en_mean: a point accepted or shared by each of two or more conflicting or differing parties
jx.jx_cn_mean: （冲突矛盾双方或多方承认的）共同立论基础

lj.lj_ly: artists from different cultural backgrounds found common ground.
lj.lj_ls: 有着不同文化背景的艺术家们找到了共同基础。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 大多数人都知道的事，众所周知之事；常识

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)of the usual or ordinary type
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英，非正式)平常的，普通的，平凡的

lj.lj_ly: Britain's common or garden house sparrow.

jx.jx_en_mean: a thing or things held jointly
the ability to get on with or appeal to ordinary people
jx.jx_cn_mean: 平易近人的能力；与普通人相处（或打动普通人）的能力

jx.jx_en_mean: have a specified amount or degree of shared interests or characteristics
jx.jx_cn_mean: 有共同之处（或兴趣、特征）

lj.lj_ly: the two men had little in common.
lj.lj_ls: 这两个人没什么共同之处。

lj.lj_ly: in common with other officers I had to undertake guard duties.
lj.lj_ls: 和其他军官一样，我不得不承担警戒任务。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 一样，同样：与所有的都相同地

entry.def: If something is common, it is found in large numbers or it happens often.

example.ex: His name was Hansen, a common name in Norway...
example.tran: 他的名字叫汉森，在挪威是一个常见的名字。

example.ex: Oil pollution is the commonest cause of death for seabirds...
example.tran: 石油污染是造成海鸟死亡最常见的原因。

entry.def: If something is common to two or more people or groups, it is done, possessed, or used by them all.

example.ex: Moldavians and Romanians share a common language...
example.tran: 摩尔达维亚人和罗马尼亚人使用同一种语言。

example.ex: Such behaviour is common to all young people.
example.tran: 这种行为在年轻人中司空见惯。

entry.def: When there are more animals or plants of a particular species than there are of related species, then the first species is called common .
Common is used to indicate that someone or something is of the ordinary kind and not special in any way.

example.ex: Democracy might elevate the common man to a position of political superiority...
example.tran: 民主也许能提升普通人的政治地位，让他们产生优越感。

example.ex: Common salt is made up of 40% sodium and 60% chloride.
example.tran: 食盐由40%的钠和60%的氯化物构成。

entry.def: Common decency or common courtesy is the decency or courtesy which most people have. You usually talk about this when someone has not shown these characteristics in their behaviour to show your disapproval of them.

example.ex: It is common decency to give your seat to anyone in greater need...
example.tran: 给更有需要的人让座是最起码的礼貌。

example.ex: He didn't have the common courtesy to ask permission.
example.tran: 他连邀准这种最起码的礼貌都没有。

entry.def: You can use common to describe knowledge, an opinion, or a feeling that is shared by people in general.
entry.tran: (知识等)众所周知的，共有的，共识的

example.ex: It is common knowledge that swimming is one of the best forms of exercise.
example.tran: 大家都知道游泳是最好的锻炼方式之一。

example.ex: ...the common view that acupuncture is only a fringe area of medicine.
example.tran: 针灸仅仅是医学的一个边缘领域的这种普遍看法

entry.def: If you describe someone or their behaviour as common, you mean that they show a lack of taste, education, and good manners.

example.ex: She might be a little common at times, but she was certainly not boring.
example.tran: 她有时候可能有点粗俗，但绝对不会让人生厌。

entry.def: A common is an area of grassy land, usually in or near a village or small town, where the public is allowed to go.
entry.tran: (通常指村庄、小镇或其附近的)公共草地

example.ex: We are warning women not to go out on to the common alone.
example.tran: 我们告诫女性不要独自去公共草地。

entry.def: The Commons is the same as the House of Commons. The members of the House of Commons can also be referred to as the Commons .
entry.tran: 同 the House of Commons;(亦指)下议员议员们

example.ex: The Prime Minister is to make a statement in the Commons this afternoon...
example.tran: 今天下午首相将在下议院发表声明。

example.ex: The Commons has spent over three months on the bill.
example.tran: 下议院在这项议案上已经花了3个多月的时间。

entry.def: If two or more things have something in common, they have the same characteristic or feature.

example.ex: The oboe and the clarinet have got certain features in common...
example.tran: 双簧管和单簧管有些相似之处。

example.ex: In common with most Italian lakes, access to the shores of Orta is restricted.
example.tran: 和大部分意大利湖泊一样，奥尔塔湖岸不对公众开放。

entry.def: If two or more people have something in common, they share the same interests or experiences.

example.ex: He had very little in common with his sister.
example.tran: 他和姐姐几乎没有什么共同语言。

means.word_mean: 1. a piece of open land for recreational use in an urban area;

sentences.sentence: "they went for a walk in the park"

means.word_mean: 1. belonging to or participated in by a community as a whole; public;

sentences.sentence: "common lands are set aside for use by all members of a community"

means.word_mean: 2. of no special distinction or quality; widely known or commonly encountered; average or ordinary or usual;

sentences.sentence: "it is common knowledge that she lives alone"

means.word_mean: 3. common to or shared by two or more parties;

sentences.sentence: "the mutual interests of management and labor"

means.word_mean: 4. commonly encountered;
5. being or characteristic of or appropriate to everyday language;

sentences.sentence: "the technical and vulgar names for an animal species"

means.word_mean: 6. of or associated with the great masses of people;

sentences.sentence: "the common people in those days suffered greatly"

means.word_mean: 7. of low or inferior quality or value;

sentences.sentence: "of what coarse metal ye are molded"- Shakespeare
"produced...the common cloths used by the poorer population"

means.word_mean: 8. lacking refinement or cultivation or taste;

sentences.sentence: "he had coarse manners but a first-rate mind"
"appealing to the vulgar taste for violence"
"the vulgar display of the newly rich"

means.word_mean: 9. to be expected; standard;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French comun (adjective), from Latin communis

sentences.en: Father Farther west, the problem is with common carp.

sentences.en: Shan tou beautiful is can not describe with any common language.

sentences.en: Wealth and money in short , are, in common language , considered as in every respect synonymous.

sentences.cn: 老师用通俗的语言说明深刻的道理.
sentences.en: The teacher expounded a profound truth in common language.

sentences.cn: 这种失调症更通俗的名字就是嘶哑.
sentences.en: The more common name for this disorder is hoarseness.

sentences.cn: 标准库为由容器类型定义的操作强加了公共的接口.
sentences.en: For those operations that are defined by the containers the library imposes a common interface.

sentences.cn: 共享资源指的是几台计算机可以在网络上使用公共的硬件资源.
sentences.en: Sharing resources refers to common hardware that several computers can use on the network.

sentences.cn: CIM代表了一种设想,即以一种公共的方法描绘任何系统的拓扑结构.
sentences.en: CIM represents an attempt to portray the topology of any system in a common manner.

sentences.cn: 在不同的视图中会存在公共的信息.
sentences.en: There can be common information in different views.

sentences.cn: 我们大家必须为公共的利益而工作.
sentences.en: We must all work for the common good.

sentences.cn: 答: 因为实习生使用同一个账号,所以他们共享一个公共的用户配置文件.
sentences.en: Answer: The interns are sharing a common user profile because they are using the same account.

sentences.cn: 各民族的精神产品成了公共的财产.
sentences.en: The intellectual creations of individual nations become common property.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 共产党宣言

sentences.cn: 克服的办法就是让供应厂商按一个公共的架构开发产品.
sentences.en: The cure is to get vendors to develop products using a common framework.

sentences.cn: 本体为分享某个领域的信息的研究人员定义了公共的词汇.
sentences.en: An ontology defines a common vocabulary for researchers who need to share information in a domain.

sentences.cn: 至关重要的差别在于系统中的所有任务共享公共的内存空间.
sentences.en: The crucial distinction is that all ofthe tasks in a system share a common memory space.

sentences.cn: 内扩网能使个人和团体进行合作,以达到公共的商业目标.
sentences.en: Extranets enable individuals and groups to collaborate to achieve common business goals.

sentences.cn: 允许使用公共的面向对象访问权限修饰来控制方法和属性的使用权限.
sentences.en: Allows the use of common OO access modifiers to control access to methods and properties.

sentences.cn: 把所有地线连到一公共的接地点.
sentences.en: Run all ground wires to a common ground point.

sentences.cn: 所有人类语言共有的基本特征
sentences.en: basic features which are common to all human languages

sentences.cn: 她展示了不论是在食品领域还是能源领域，许多可持续发展倡导者所共有的理想主义。
sentences.en: She exhibits the idealism common to many advocates of sustainability, be it in food or in energy.

sentences.cn: 但实际上,这种共有的,正常的恐惧感并不是很轻易的就能消除的.
sentences.en: But the fact that such fears common and normal doesn't mean they can be taken lightly.

sentences.cn: 词汇相互借用是各种语言所共有的现象.
sentences.en: As a common phenomenon, languages borrow words from each other.

sentences.cn: 由于这个页面是所有样式共有的, 所以统一在这里介绍.
sentences.en: This page is common to all style categories . Therefore, it is described only once.

sentences.cn: 正义、仁慈和更美好的生活是人类共有的希望.
sentences.en: The hope of justice and mercy and better lives are common to all humanity.

sentences.cn: 有一些人也建立一个共有的家庭, 但是为了保有全部的养老金,只是住在一起而不结婚.
sentences.en: Some also establish a common household, but stay unmarried in order to keep their full pensions.

sentences.cn: 所有权保留制度是英美法和大陆法所共有的制度.
sentences.en: The ownership reservation lies in both the cival law system and the common law system.

sentences.cn: 他具有我们所共有的一些缺点.
sentences.en: He has some faults common to us.

sentences.cn: 哺乳动物共有的一种基因的微小突变可能改变了人类的命运.
sentences.en: A tiny mutation in a gene common to mammals may have changed the destiny of humanity.

sentences.en: Introspection, and with the habit of keeping a diary, was a common Puritan trait.

sentences.cn: 这个内容是整个人类共有的.
sentences.en: This content is common to all humanity.

sentences.cn: 某些欲望对所有的人是共有的.
sentences.en: Certain desires are common to all men.

sentences.cn: 中国人共有的一种观念是长者应受到尊敬.
sentences.en: One common Chinese notion is that the elders ought to be respected.

sentences.cn: 此类包含由提供的所有传输绑定配置元素所共有的属性.
sentences.en: This class contains properties are common to all of the transport binding configuration elements provided by.

sentences.cn: 这种过程是肿瘤浸润过程中共有的现象.
sentences.en: This sort of process is common during tumor invasion.

sentences.cn: 这花园是两家共有的.
sentences.en: The garden is common to the two houses.

sentences.cn: 如果没有共有的连接类型, 握手响应就必须是不成功的.
sentences.en: If there are no connection Types in common, the handshake response MUST be unsuccessful.

sentences.en: Some components of a thriving friendship'are honesty, naturalness , thoughtfulness, some common interests.

sentences.cn: 人所共有的驯服凶猛动物的冲动怂恿着她——一种下意识的冲动.
sentences.en: Likewise she was stirred by the common impulse to tame the wild thing.

sentences.cn: 大多数的比较复杂的情绪是各种高等动物和我们所共有的.
sentences.en: Most of the more complex emotions are common to the higher animals and ourselves.

sentences.cn: 数量夸张是汉语和英语所共有的修辞格.
sentences.en: Quantitative hyperbole is common figure of speech in both Chinese and English.

sentences.cn: 而它应该成为大家共有的谋生手段, 不论他是什么人.
sentences.en: But it was to be a common livelihood to all, without respect of persons.

sentences.cn: 坚持是世界上成功人士共有的品质。
sentences.en: Persistence is the common trait of anyone who has had a significant impact on the world.

sentences.cn: 这道栅栏侵害了我们牧场的共有权.
sentences.en: This fence contravenes our common right to pasturage.

sentences.cn: 公共用地是留出来供社区所有成员使用的.
sentences.en: Common lands are set aside for use by all members of a community.

sentences.en: In most people's eyes she was nothing more than a common criminal .

sentences.en: Democracy might elevate the common man to a position of political superiority...

sentences.cn: 在研究人员绘制的地图中，不仅有该城市庞大而华丽的礼仪区域，还有数百个供普通百姓生活的简易公寓建筑。
sentences.en: The researchers mapped not only the city’s vast and ornate ceremonial areas, but also hundreds of simpler apartment complexes where common people lived.

sentences.en: She has revealed the truth of the common marriage: helplessness and endurance, crudity and warmth.

sentences.cn: 文学以普通人为描写对象,才能发挥它真正的功能.
sentences.en: Literature came nearest to its true function when it dealt with common people.

sentences.cn: 我当然不能说我看人多么深刻, 但是普通的情理,我总可以说还懂得吧.
sentences.en: I don't profess to be profound; but I lay claim to common sense.

sentences.en: For us common folk, blue may mirror the melancholy of mortals dwarfed by the infinite.
